title: Handwriting fonts for children
content:
Anybody knows handwriting fonts for children? I need some didactic fonts for children, for caligraph teaching.   
Thanks,   
Maria

 [‹ (x) Lowrider - Magneto {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080524215820/http:/typophile.com/node/27024 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) And Love Said No - Sloop Script {Ignacio} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080524215820/http:/typophile.com/node/5201 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: Try [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080524215820/http:/www.dafont.com/en/theme.php?cat=602&page=1&nb_ppp_old=40&texte=Try%20one%20of%20these%20Mary&nb_ppp=40&Envoyer=%A0OK%A0). Note that several of these fonts have several variants in the download (with lines, with direction arrows, etc.).
